songLink.description: Link to your song. Youtube and Soundcloud are supported at the moment. Your song links should be based off of the album versions of songs for a better experience.

songName.description: Name of the song. This is what your users' guess will have to be.

songArtist.description: Creator of the song. This is used for enriching the metadata of the guesses, and allows for differentiating songs that have the same name.

musicVideoLink.description: Optional: Link to your song's music video, to be shown on the result screen. Your song will be used if it's a youtube link.
